bibl.title: Cribra orbitalia - Diachronic Patterns and Interpretations from the ‘Ain Tirghi and Kellis Cemeteries.
bibl.note: Abstract. - The orbital manifestation of the 'porotic hyperostosis' is referred to as cribra orbitalia.

bibl.title: Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: FAIRGRIEVE Scott I. and J. Eldon MOLTO, Cribra orbitalia - Diachronic Patterns and Interpretations from the ‘Ain Tirghi and Kellis Cemeteries.

Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 12 (Oxford, 2008) p. 159.
Abstract. - The orbital manifestation of the 'porotic hyperostosis' is referred to as cribra orbitalia.
